Senior Software Engineer

San Francisco, CA

About TechCorp

We're a leading technology company building the future of work.

About the Role

We're seeking a Senior Software Engineer to join our Platform team. You'll be responsible for building scalable backend services and APIs.

What You'll Do

  • Design and implement REST APIs using FastAPI
  • Build scalable microservices architecture
  • Collaborate with frontend engineers on API design
  • Mentor junior engineers
  • Participate in code reviews

What We're Looking For

  • 5+ years of professional software development experience
  • Expert-level Python programming skills
  • Experience with FastAPI, Flask, or Django
  • Strong experience with PostgreSQL or other relational databases
  • Experience building RESTful APIs
  • Proficiency with Git and modern development workflows
  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience
  • Excellent communication and collaboration skills

Bonus Points

  • Experience with React or Vue.js
  • Docker and Kubernetes experience
  • AWS or GCP cloud platform experience
  • CI/CD pipeline experience
  • Experience with microservices architecture

Benefits

  • Competitive salary: $150,000 - $200,000
  • Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance
  • 401(k) with company match
  • Unlimited PTO
  • Remote-friendly culture
  • Professional development budget
Employment Type: Full-time
Remote: Hybrid (3 days in office)
